dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.text: Hey, Anna. Did you get the keys to our new apartment?

dialogues.speaker: Anna
dialogues.text: Yes, I did. It's right here in my bag.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Anna took out the keys and held them up for John to see.

dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.text: Great. Let's go check out our new home.
